content: in this legal case the trani court has issued a final ruling after 11 years they have declared the succession open and reserved a portion of the inheritance for the deceaseds daughter and spouse who were both injured the court also deemed a donation made in 1982 as ineffective and reduced its value based on the plaintiffs injury they have granted full ownership of a property to the plaintiff and ordered the defendant to pay the price difference additionally the defendant is responsible for covering the litigation costs the court considered various legal principles such as determining legitimate beneficiaries reducing donations and burden of proof they rejected claims of simulation and defect in the acceptance of the inheritance benefit inventory the court allowed a legitimate heir to intervene and granted their claim for subrogation and reduction they calculated the value of the inheritance and the injury suffered by the plaintiff applying rules for reduction and assigning the property to the plaintiff the defendant is required to pay the price difference and the litigation costs finally the registrar has been instructed to transcribe the judgment
